name: Dark Soul 64
description:
C&C are always welcome

The game is a demake of Dark soul with kinda the spec of N64

Input : 

  • Mouse = Look around
  • Left Mouse button = Attack 
  • Right Mouse button = Block attack
  • ZQSD = move the character
  • Space + ZQSD = Roll 
  • E = Use (on item on the floor ) & Equip / unequip
  • A = Target Lock the closest enemy
  • Esc = Pause 

In the bonfire area you can press E to get all your life back and make all the enemy reset (this can work only if you are alone in this area ).

credit :
- From Software for the Souls series
- animation from close combat : swordsman on epic game store
- modular castle kit by Colorado Stark on OpenGameArt

rq :
the binding is for french keyboard but you can easily swap, i will make update for the xbox controler and qwerty keyboard
